amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce the EPA final rule "Determinations of Attainment by the Attainment Date, Extensions of the Attainment Date, and Reclassification of Areas Classified as Marginal for the 2015 Ozone National Ambient Air Quality Standards" with respect to Berrien, Allegan, and Muskegon counties in Michigan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
